page.title: 05LEISURE.Trosley.Warden.
page.content: Mr Gorman is the deputy warden of Trosley Country Park.He has held this position for two and a half years and really enjoys his work. He has various duties including; re-making signs and fences,caring for trees,shrubs and footpaths,picking up litter and cleaning the toilets,taking school and coach parties on nature tours,collecting money from the car park pay boxes and running the park's imformation centre. He works a forty hour week but sometimes gets called out at the weekend, particularly during the summer. Although Mr Gorman likes his work he is faced with many problems. Some are natural,for example the two hundred and fifty year old beech trees are so large many of the thick branch- es are breaking off under the strain. As well as the natural problems there
